--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> OOC:  I hate this restart.  I had to take a shot at it sometime!
> BIC:
> Skulletron had the slight feeling that Wolfenstein was insulting 
him for a
> second, but then he realized he himself hardly knew what he was 
talking
> about.  Maybe his circuits were acting up.  
> He smiled and said, "At last, closer to the base."
> He paused for a minute, and asked, "Excuse me, exactly what faction 
does this base belong to?"
